content: ARK Invest's Chief Futurist Brett Winton believes the perception of the AI trade as a bubble is "flat wrong."

Brett Winton predicts that productivity gains from AI tools like ChatGPT are expected to "triple over the course of this year and then triple again," leading to a compound increase in pricing power of 40 to 50 times.
Brett Winton argues that current revenue projections for AI companies are "conservative relative to the pricing power that they have."
Brett Winton believes the massive data center CapEx spending seen today is justified.
Brett Winton holds a contrarian view that Wall Street "underestimates how valuable cures are" because it prefers recurring revenue models.
